snippet: This new album draws on the chamber-like cool of Jimmy Giuffre’s music from the late 1950s and early ’60s.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews Samuel Blaser Quartet album Spring Rain.
lead_paragraph: This new album draws on the chamber-like cool of Jimmy Giuffre’s music from the late 1950s and early ’60s.

headline.main: Review: Samuel Blaser Quartet’s ‘Spring Rain’ Recalls a Ghost
headline.print_headline: Review: Samuel Blaser Quartet’s ‘Spring Rain’ Recalls a Ghost
